source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_00<tab>Tesleen casts her gaze around the Inn, hoping to spot Alisaie.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_00<tab>旅立ちの宿のテスリーンは、アリゼーの姿を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_01<tab>Seeing no sign of Alisaie inside the Inn, Tesleen suggests you venture out to the watchtower, where your mutual friend usually begins her patrol.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_01<tab>テスリーンから、アリゼーが見回りに出ていると聞いた。南の物見櫓にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAF901 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_02<tab>Though Alisaie is nowhere to be seen, you do find some familiar footprints. If you follow them, you may yet catch up with her...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_02<tab>物見櫓を見渡したところ、足跡を発見した。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAFA01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_03<tab>The tracks head northwest, and so you must do the same.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_03<tab>足跡は北西へと続いていた。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAFB01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_04<tab>More footprints lead off into the distance, drawing you ever further northwest...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_04<tab>足跡はさらに北西へと続いていた。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAFC01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_05<tab>Just as you are beginning to wonder how far this “patrol route” will take you from the Inn, the tracks curve around to the west.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_05<tab>足跡は西へと続いていた。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAFD01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_06<tab>Without warning, the trail comes to an abrupt stop, leaving you at a loss as to how to proceed. As you attempt to divine what could have happened, you witness Alisaie leaping off a nearby building in pursuit of a fleeing sin eater. You approach as she finishes off her prey, and your long-awaited reunion quickly becomes an eager exchange of news.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_06<tab>足跡を追って、アリゼーと再会した。旅立ちの宿付近の「アリゼー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_07<tab>Alisaie paints a grim picture of Amh Araeng and the threat posed by the sin eaters. It seems that she intends for you to learn about the situation at the edge of the world firsthand...
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SEQ_07<tab>アリゼーと話した。彼女がこの険しい場所で知った、罪喰いについての情報とは、いかなるものなのだろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TODO_00<tab>Look for signs of Alisaie near the Derrick.
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_001<tab>...Hm. I think she might be out on patrol.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_001<tab>うーん、いないみたいね。
ってことは、外の見回りに出てるんだと思う。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_002<tab>You could wait, I suppose─but why not go and surprise her!? She usually takes a look at things from the watchtower first, so you might be able to catch her there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_002<tab>見回りのときは、物見櫓（ものみやぐら）を拠点にするから、
そっちに行ってもらえれば、ここで待つより早く会えるかも！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_003<tab>It's not far─head out the south side and you'll soon see it. I'll stay behind, in case she comes back while you're gone.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_003<tab>物見櫓は、南側の出口から出てすぐだよ。
私は、入れ違いにならないように、
仕事をしながらここで待ってるね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_005<tab>The watchtower's on the south side. I only wish I could be there to see Alisaie's face when she realizes it's you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_TESLEEN_000_005<tab>物見櫓は、南側の出口から出てすぐだよ。
アリゼー、あなたが急に来たら、きっとびっくりするね！

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Alisaie is nowhere to be seen, but you spot fresh footprints on the ground...and they look to be about the right size.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>……アリゼーの姿はないが、近くに新しそうな足跡を見つけた。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The small footprints lead off to the northwest.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>……足跡は、北西に向かって続いている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The footprints continue on to the northwest.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>……足跡は、さらに北西に向かって続いている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The footprints curve around to the west.
target: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>……足跡は、西に向かって続いている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>There are more tracks here, but they end in a mess of disturbed sand...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>足跡があるが、途中で乱れて掻き消えている。
ここで何かあったのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>It's just a matter of time─more for some, less for others. Those patients will all become monsters in the end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>テスリーンたちが世話している患者……
彼らは全員、罪喰い化しかけている人よ。
程度に差はあるけれどね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>And to add insult to injury, the afflicted are <var 1A 02 /var>feared<var 1A 01 /var>. Shunned. Cast out of society, and exiled here to the edge of the world...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>ああなると、周りには恐れられ、人里には住めない。
それで、こんな世界の「端」に連れてこられるんだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>The only good thing I have to say about this hellish place is that it has served me well as a training ground. Tesleen and the others have also been kind enough to share their knowledge of the sin eaters.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>本当に地獄のようだけど……
幸い、私が修行するにはちょうどいい場所だったし、
テスリーンたちから、罪喰いについて学ぶこともできた。

source: TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_063<tab>Which is knowledge I can now share with you...while you help me finish my patrol, of course.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMA305_03295_ALISAIE_000_063<tab>あなたにも、それを共有するわ。
私たちが今後どうするかを決めるためにも、ね。
